wizard.welcome: Welcome to the OpenClose Checking Account of
wizard.beforeStartText: We would like to thank you for placing your trust in the OpenClose Current Account. Next we will guide you in a small form so that you can provide us with the necessary data to complete the contract
wizard.firstStepInfo: First of all we want to make sure that you accept that we treat your data according to our data protection policy
wizard.userAgreementLabel: I agree to the use of my data according to the data protection policy and confirm that I am of legal age
wizard.userAgreementTooltip: You have to accept the conditions
wizard.createNewPasswordInfo: To continue the process, you need to set a password to your product
wizard.passwordHintInputLabel: Create a hint to remember the password (optional)
wizard.feedbackSuccessText: Now you can access your product with it
wizard.feedbackErrorText: Your password could not be set. Please try again later

form.required: You must fill in this field
form.textExceededLength: You must not exceed the characters
